评论详情: This belt is really cute and does the job, my only concern is longevity! I haven’t had it for very long so I’m happy with it for now.
Super great quality and durability especially for the price. The little moon embellishments on it seem to be sturdy too! Would def recommend!
I got this belt because I thought it looked like oakley and it looked pretty cool. But it gets ripped up very easily but it’s still a cool belt. I just wish it was better quality
I guess I should’ve expected the quality to be bad at this price but this really ain’t worth yall money.
Super super cute, has a lot of holes so many options(I hate when a belt only has like three), the little charms shift a little but it’s overall really cute.

I recently purchased this belt and it looks exactly like the photos provided! The material is  fine and sturdy enough. However, the belt buckle is oddly shaped so pulling out the belt from the buckle can be a struggle at times. I’m sure with long use, the constant scraping of the belt to the buckle may cause some wear and tear. Overall, a fine belt that’s very y2k-esque.
